entry.title: kseverin/PopulationVirus_simulation
entry.summary: Perl program which simulates the outbreak of a virus based on a transmission rate

entry.title: peczenyj/Fix-DateTime
entry.summary:
Small monkey patch in DateTime class (perl)

Fix-DateTime version 0.02

Module to apply monkey patch in DateTime class

DEMO

$ cd ./examples ; demo.pl # if installed
or $ perl -I lib examples/demo.pl

DOCUMENTATION

See POD in Fix::DateTime

$ perldoc Fix::DateTime # if installed or $ perldoc lib/Fix/DateTime.pm

INSTALLATION

To install this module type the following:

perl Makefile.PL make make test make install

DEPENDENCIES

This module requires these other modules and libraries:

DateTime (tested with 0.78) List::Util (tested with 1.23 - just 'first' is needed)

COPYRIGHT AND LICENCE

Copyright (C) 2013 by Tiago Peczenyj

This library is free software; you can redistribute it and/or modify it under the same terms as Perl itself, either Perl version 5.10.0 or, at your option, any later version of Perl 5 you may have available.
